sentence.Network_en: The parliaments of Australia and Indonesia have yet to ratify the treaty.
sentence.Network_cn: 澳大利亚和印度尼西亚的国会尚未批准该条约。

sentence.Network_en: The heads of two governments met to ratify the peace treaty.
sentence.Network_cn: 两国政府首脑会晤批准和平条约.

sentence.Network_en: The government of Honduras refused to ratify the convention.
sentence.Network_cn: 洪都拉斯政府拒不批准该约.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 批字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 批转〖 endorse〗 批准〖 authorize;ratify;approve〗 批办〖 examineandapproveanddo〗.
译网情深 - 打印文章 - ... first refusal rights 第一优先权 ratify （正式）批准，认可 avoid,set aside 撤消，宣布无效.
核_百度百科 ... 24. 核议[ examine and discuss] 25. 核准[ ratify] 26.核资[ check capital fund].
求翻译单词！_百度知道 ... federal 联邦的 ratify 正式批准 decline 减少.

list.abs: the administration's problem always going to be the Senate , which decides whether to ratify international treaties , and doesn't much like doing so .这届政府的问题总是出在参议院，是否批准国际条约由那里决定，而在这方面它一向不怎么积极。
Each Member which ratifies this Convention shall ensure the effectiveapplication of its provis ions ., 批准本公约的每一会员国应确保有效地实施本公约的规定.
they ratify the pact because they think it will bring peace .他们批准了这项协定，因为他们认为它将能带来和平。
the details of the deal are being kept quiet until the local unions ratify , but it's expected to a done deal by late next week .的细节正在保持沉默，直到当地工会批准，但预计将是木已成舟了下周晚些时候。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French ratifier, from medieval Latin ratificare, from Latin ratus 'fixed' (see rate)

entry.def: When national leaders or organizations ratify a treaty or written agreement, they make it official by giving their formal approval to it, usually by signing it or voting for it.

example.ex: The parliaments of Australia and Indonesia have yet to ratify the treaty.
example.tran: 澳大利亚和印度尼西亚的国会尚未批准该条约。

means.word_mean: 1. approve and express assent, responsibility, or obligation;

auth_sentence.content: He is the only one who can ratify international treaties.
auth_sentence.res_content: He is the only one who can ratify international treaties.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He is the only one who can ratify international treaties.

auth_sentence.content: Both parliaments will need to ratify the accord.
auth_sentence.res_content: Both parliaments will need to ratify the accord.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Both parliaments will need to ratify the accord.

auth_sentence.content: Eighty-two Senators voted aye to ratify, only 13 said nay.
auth_sentence.res_content: Eighty-two Senators voted aye to ratify, only 13 said nay.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Eighty-two Senators voted aye to ratify, only 13 said nay.

stems_affixes.word_buile: ration[n.理性,定量]+al……的→理性的,合理的
rat计算,考虑+e→估价；评价→比率；等级
rat计算,考虑+ion→计算出来的量→定量,引申为理性
ration[n.理性,定量]+al……的→理性的,合理的
rat计算,考虑+e→估价；评价→比率；等级
rat计算,考虑+ify表动词→通过计算证实

means.word_mean: 正式批准, 使正式生效，签认(合约等)

sentences.en: The heads of the two government ratified the treaty.
sentences.cn: 两国政府首脑签署了条约。

jushi.english: The treaty was ratified by all the member states.
jushi.chinese: 这个条约得到了所有成员国的批准。

jushi.english: The heads of the two government ratified the treaty.
jushi.chinese: 两国政府首脑签署了条约。
